game.name: Speedlust Driver
game.description:
Do car racing games excite you a lot and create Goosebumps in your body? Hey boys! If yes, we have got you covered with a latest racing game where your aim is to assemble your car and then choose races from world map to get participated. Join Speedlust Driver and be prepared to race your chosen vehicle against multiple driving expert opponents from all across the city! Do not take your enemies easily as their cars run very fast on the road.

Your winning will depend upon how wisely you operate your vehicle without missing the â€˜next gear.â€™ Drive fast to win each race, earn cash and then use that money to upgrade your vehicle in this one of the best HTML5 car games for boys! Start by building your vehicle using the parts available in your store! Your next job is to compete against your opponents and try to win each race to grab extra experience points. Make sure to grab enough coins to unlock goodies.

Race your car through multiple obstacles to unlock the best car possible at level 10. Build a car on your own first and then drive it until you secure the first position in a car race competition! More races you will win the higher points and coins you will be able to collect in the end. Move your vehicle by swiping the screen on your mobile phone or using arrow keys on your desktop! Shift gears with the help of spacebar or by tapping on the speedometer! Good luck to play free racing games that are playable on multiple devices without download!
